jobs.description: Worked on the world's most versatile e-book previewer. Designed and implementation the app's modular, multi-layered SASS framework, and led the development of its ultra-lightweight embeddable widget.

As lead developer, I worked on numerous websites, web apps and mobile games, handling such diverse tasks as UX design, visual design, front-end development, tooling, Node.JS servers, deployment strategies and infrastructure.
Designed and developed a large-scale Wordpress portal, as well as various custom plugins tailored to the client’s particular needs.
Created an HTML5 game programming library. Blink’s component-oriented API and extensive feature set gave my team a critical advantage in time-constrained game jams.
Helped architect and develop a web-based CRM. The app crunches large volumes of medical data into helpful charts that assist the CEO in the decision-making process.
Taught a game programming course on Java for mobile devices (J2ME), and co-founded a local chapter of the USM Games organization.
Designed and coded personal portfolios, educational websites, online catalogs, etc. I worked with individuals and companies alike, both local and foreign.
Interned at an automotive parts retailer. This was my first glimpse of the pivotal role of computer software in running a business.
